    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn. Overrides LordOfCinder.playTurn()
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class LordOfCinder
      Parameters:

      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
